content:
Department of Computer Applications

   The Department of Computer Applications (Self- Finance) was established in 2000 and the Management has facilitated a well equipped laboratory to keep up with the recent trends and demands of the ever changing technology. The laboratory is provided with 104 computers with advanced configurations and uninterrupted power supply for the smooth conduct of  practicals. The department has well qualified and experienced staff to cater the needs of the students. Periodic upgradation of the syllabus and choice of optional papers depending on the latest Technology are the highlights of the present course.

    The course offered is BCA. As the demand for BCA course is high, a second section has been functioning for the past three years. It produces very good results at the University level examinations and has 20 University rank holders to its credit since 2000.The outgoing students are well placed in the IT industries.
